title: Activision releases statement on Tony Hawk’s Pro Skater 5 issues
text:

Published By: Lazygamer.net - Today 
Activision has released a short statement about Tony Hawk's Pro Skater 5 and the myriad issues plaguing the game, and have managed to say ve...
